title: Deploy the infrastructure services
content:
At the Prepare phase, the installation portal deploys the infrastructure services. Follow these steps to complete the OMT deployment.

  1. The Deployment of Infrastructure Services page lists the core foundation services in the deployment. After the deployment finishes, click Next.
  2. On the Preparation Complete page, click Next to complete the preparation.

This will take you to the Configure/Deploy phase in the installation portal. After you click Next, you can't go back to the Prepare phase.
